name: Connoisseur Tabl'o
description:
Connoisseur Tabl'o is a quick and fun game we made in less than 48 hours for "Paint Jam 2020". Enjoy!

Made by:

Sertif (programmer)

Comrade Zach & Uncle Jeol (graphics)

--------------

Controls:

Z - Jump
LEFT/RIGHT ARROWS - Move
DOWN - Crouch
DOWN + Z - Slide
UP - Enter door
